meanings.definition: A gene or genetic material that has been artificially introduced into an organism.
meanings.sent1: Scientists used transgenes to modify the plant's DNA.
meanings.sent2: The transgenes from the fish were inserted into the tomato plant.
meanings.sent3: The transgenes in the apple made it taste like a banana!
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a mix of flowers, each one a transgenes of beauty.
meanings.sent5: The transgenes glowed brightly under the microscope.

meanings.definition: The process of introducing foreign genetic material into an organism.
meanings.sent1: The transgenes of the bacteria were carefully inserted into the mouse.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the effects of transgenes on the growth of the plants.
meanings.sent3: The transgenes party in the petri dish was a hit among the cells.
meanings.sent4: The transgenes injection was like a spark of change in the organism.
meanings.sent5: The transgenes transfer was a delicate operation in the lab.
